title: Ground Up Construction Loan – 19 Townhomes
subtitle: Caldwell, ID
description: Construction financing for a 19-unit residential townhome project in the Boise submarket. Proceeds refinanced a bridge loan and funded vertical construction.

title: Perm Loan – 204-Unit Class A Multifamily
subtitle: Western Oregon
description: Permanent financing for a newly constructed 204-unit Class A apartment complex with an extended interest-only period.

title: Bridge-to-Perm Refinance – 144-Unit Class A Multi
subtitle: Washington
description: Bridge refinance for a recently completed 144-unit Class A multifamily property during lease-up. Property was 80% occupied at closing with a $1M earn-out subject to debt yield hurdles.

title: Bridge Loan – Redmond Industrial
subtitle: Redmond, WA
description: Senior bridge loan for a borrower whose business was impacted by COVID. Enabled time for revenue stabilization before bank refinancing.

title: Perm Loan – Class A Mixed Use Acquisition
subtitle: Kansas City, MO
description: Acquisition financing for Thrive Flats, a recently constructed 100-unit mixed-use property with ground lease, broken condo retail, and underwriting to pro forma rents.

title: Perm Loan – 160-Unit Class A Apartment
subtitle: Nampa, ID
description: Refinance of Breckenridge Apartments, a 160-unit Class A property closed prior to stabilization at 85% occupancy. Lender required only 75% occupancy.

title: Construction Loan – 71-Unit Mixed Use Project
subtitle: Salem, OR
description: All-in-one construction/mini-perm/perm loan for Anthony's Place, a 71-unit mixed-use project with 13,000 SF ground floor retail. Fixed rate through stabilization.

title: Perm Financing – 4-Property Retail Portfolio
subtitle: Salem, OR MSA
description: Cash-out refinance for a 4-property retail portfolio spread across western Oregon. Provided future CAPEX funding facilities.

title: Perm Financing – Multi-Tenant Retail
subtitle: Salem, OR
description: Cash-out refinance of Turnridge Corner with non-recourse execution via a national life insurance company.

title: Build-to-Rent Townhome Construction Loans
subtitle: North Salem, OR
description: Two separate build-to-rent townhome construction loans (12 and 16 units) closed in 45 days during market turmoil. Fixed rate, interest-only, no minimum interest period.

title: Construction Loan – 94-Unit Build-to-Rent Townhomes
subtitle: Woodburn, OR
description: Vertical construction loan for Boones Crossing, a 96-unit build-to-rent townhome project. Proceeds refinanced existing mortgage, funded construction, and included an 18-month interest reserve.

title: Construction Loan – 61-Unit Subdivision
subtitle: Salem, OR
description: High-LTC construction loan for Timberline Hills, a 61-unit for-sale single-family subdivision. Proceeds refinanced existing mortgage and funded construction plus interest reserve.

title: Construction Loan – 31-Unit Subdivision
subtitle: Eugene, OR
description: 100% loan-to-cost construction financing for a 31-unit for-sale single-family subdivision. Fast closing in 40 days. Lender recognized sponsor's imputed equity.

title: Bridge Loan – 68-Lot Single Family Lots
subtitle: Eugene, OR
description: Interest-only bridge loan for 68 paper lots with no prepayment penalty. Funded interest reserve and site development. Lender ready to fund vertical starts.

title: Construction Loan – 83-Unit Single Family Subdivision
subtitle: Salem, OR
description: All-in-one development and vertical construction loan for Bethel Park, an 83-unit for-sale single-family subdivision. Single closing approach with 30-day origination to closing.

title: Bridge Loan – Future 179-Unit Apartment Project
subtitle: Woodburn, OR
description: Cash-out refinance of a permitted land tract (permitted for 407 apartment units). High-leverage financing with a 30-day closing, located near Amazon distribution facility.

title: Construction Loan – 60-Unit Build-to-Rent Townhomes
subtitle: Woodburn, OR
description: High-LTC construction loan for Young Street Townhomes, a 60-unit build-to-rent project. Sponsor's track record yielded best-in-class pricing. Recourse loan.

title: Perm Financing – 52-Unit Student Housing
subtitle: Bellingham, WA
description: Permanent financing for Samish Station, a 52-unit student housing property (two buildings: 24 and 27 units). 100% occupied at application despite COVID disruptions. Open to prepayment anytime, no debt service reserves required.

title: Bridge Loan – 96-Unit Apartment
subtitle: Salem, OR
description: Acquisition financing for a recently constructed 96-unit garden-style apartment. 50% occupied at application with 40-day application to closing. Included future funding facility for renovations.

title: Dev Site Acquisition
subtitle: Seattle MSA
description: Acquisition financing for an owner-occupied commercial office building site. Secured a 70 bps pricing discount via wholesale banking relationships. No prepayment penalty option available.

title: Perm Financing – Medical Office Building
subtitle: Bellingham, WA
description: Cash-out refinance of a 20,000 SF medical office building. 80% occupied by a single credit tenant. Full leverage loan with rate adjusted downward at closing.

title: Perm Financing – 28-Unit Apartment
subtitle: Oregon
description: Cash-out refinance of a garden-style 28-unit apartment in a tertiary Oregon market (100 miles from nearest MSA). 16 of 28 units under master lease to a hospital. Non-recourse agency loan at maximum leverage.

title: Dealership Refinance
subtitle: Central Washington
description: Refinance of three used car dealerships and a warehouse. Enabled the acquisition of a Chevrolet/Nissan franchise dealership and satisfied General Motors liquidity requirements.

title: Bridge Loan – Value-Add 44-Unit Apartment
subtitle: Salem, OR
description: Acquisition of a 1990s-vintage value-add 44-unit apartment with deferred maintenance. Rents 18% below market with a 40% expense ratio. Included future funding facility for exterior renovations.

title: Perm Financing – La Quinta Acquisition
subtitle: Lynnwood, WA
description: Acquisition financing for a 101-key La Quinta hotel for a first-time hotel buyer. Strong historical occupancy and cash flow. Located off Interstate 5 with seller's management team retained.

title: Construction Financing – 96-Unit Apartment
subtitle: Oregon
description: Ground-up construction financing for a 96-unit mid-rise multifamily in a tertiary Oregon market. High-leverage non-bank financing with proceeds not fully funded at closing (no negative arbitrage).

title: Perm Financing – 330-Unit Apartment
subtitle: Yakima, WA
description: Long-term fixed rate mortgage for a 330-unit apartment community. Included $5.5M cash out with early payoff from existing loan. Enabled supplemental financing option for future rent increases.

title: ALF Mini-Perm
subtitle: Pacific Northwest
description: Mini-perm financing for a 91-bed assisted living and memory care facility. Complex capital stack with subordinate EB5 note. Featured interest reserve with 50% recourse burn-off at DSCR thresholds.

title: Perm Financing – 165-Key Best Western
subtitle: Pacific Northwest
description: Permanent financing for a 165-key Best Western constructed in 1999. All proceeds refinanced existing debt. Included a large operating line of credit. Borrower was a non-US citizen.

title: Bridge-to-HUD
subtitle: Pacific Northwest
description: Bridge-to-HUD financing for an 88-unit assisted living facility in a rural Pacific Northwest town. Medicaid-heavy census with low occupancy. Turn-around scenario with lender-funded CAPEX reserve and 12-month IO strip to stabilize cash flow for HUD submission.

title: Permanent Refinance – Multi-Tenant Retail
description: Permanent refinance of a Class B multi-tenant retail building. Improved rate by 80 bps versus competing term sheet and obtained par pricing.

title: Senior Bridge – Class A Office
description: Bridge loan for a 20,000 SF Class A office building. Borrower faced bank maturity refusal with 50% vacancy and lack of liquidity. No prepayment penalty or yield maintenance. Included 7-month interest reserve for leasing commissions and TI. 14-day close.

title: Single Tenant Acquisition
subtitle: North Carolina
description: 1031 exchange acquisition financing for a NNN credit-tenant-leased Burger King for a California investor. Financed through a regional North Carolina credit union.

title: Fix and Flip Credit Line
subtitle: Pacific Northwest
description: Evergreen fix-and-flip line of credit for an active Pacific Northwest investor. Covers SFR, 1-4 units, condos, townhomes, multifamily up to 20 units, and new construction. After-repair value must be 75% or less.

title: Multi-Use Refinance and Renovation
subtitle: Oregon
description: Refinance of a multi-use building with vacant second and third floors. Hard payoff on private money note with conventional refinancing unavailable due to low occupancy. Included future funding facilities for TI and CAPEX.

title: Denny's Refinance
subtitle: Ohio
description: Refinance of a Denny's restaurant property for a California investor unfamiliar with midwest banking. Secured competitive terms from a national bank.

title: Land Acquisition
subtitle: Pacific Northwest
description: Regional bank financing for the acquisition of unimproved land for a future assisted living facility. Best-in-class assisted living operator and developer.
